```lisp
['(:action stock
  ; Universal action for stocking and preparing items
  :parameters (?agent - agent ?item - object)
  :precondition (and (available ?agent) (separate ?item) (not (ready ?item)))
  :effect (and (stored ?item) (ready ?item)))',
 '(:action make
  ; Create a plan or prepare an entity
  :parameters (?entity - object)
  :precondition (and (not (prepared ?entity)))
  :effect (and (prepared ?entity) (state-at-ease ?entity))']
```
